me awanhala galu kotuwe pihitana parani godanagillakayi pawathwagena yanne.awanhala athule saha pitatha aahara ganna than sakas karala thiyanawa.athulatha kordo wala pawa putu mesa sakas karala mehi yana ena ayata ida pahasuwa hadala thiyanawa.athulatha mesa putu tikak lagin lagin asurala thiyana nisa poddak ida paduwa nam ahirila wage thamayi thiyenne.awanhala athulatha kaha pahayata huru patakin biththi warnaganwala thibenawa.mesa wala pawa ee patata samana patakin warna ganwala.awanhala athulatha hondin pirisiduwata pawathwagena yana bawak penawa.wiwida wargaye wesmuhunu me awanhale biththi wala ellala thiyanawa.eeka tikak wenas.ee wagema rathri kalayata me kaha paha bithththi ekka widuli pahan walin ena sudu mada aalokayath awanhala thulata amuthu gathiyak ekathu karala thiyanawa.awanhale godanagille iparani bawath me awanhalata yam aalokayak genath kiyanna puluwan.
